name: Shikhar The Peak
description: Shikhar is a Hindi word which means "The Peak" or "Mountain". In this game Shikhar is referring to the challenges and obstacles which you will encounter during the game. The game empowers you with abilities like Climbing, Jumping, Grabbing ledges and this was not enough game also provides you special abilities like Time Rewind & Double Jump. You will use all this abilities to clear different kinds of levels and challenges. It's completely offline so internet or no internet, Just launch the game and face the challenges. Good Luck Ninja!
